title: Spoke to a Rioter about PAX
body:
Ain't gonna put his name out, but I'll link you the most important part of our chat.

https://i.gyazo.com/7d529c87d0def42834eb6eeece614b85.png
https://i.gyazo.com/ac763c1408d510e2dcb47610d9454990.png

Long story short; Daniel Klein supposedly holds a pretty nice position in the company and will probably not be dealt with the way the community wants him to be.
